ValidationRule.description: Validates that the contact Shipping Street, Shipping Postal Code/Zip, and Shipping Country are provided.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( ISBLANK( ShippingStreet ), ISBLANK( ShippingPostalCode ), ISBLANK( ShippingCountry ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill out the Mailing Address Fields. Street, Postal Code/Zip, and Country are required.
